title: User Login with Valid Credentials
description: Verify that users can successfully log in using valid email and password combination and all role-based access controls are applied.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Enter valid email and password
Click login button
Verify user is authenticated and redirected to appropriate dashboard based on role
Check that no unauthorized pages are accessible

title: User Login with Invalid Credentials
description: Verify that users cannot log in with invalid email or password and appropriate error messages are shown.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Enter invalid email and/or password
Click login button
Verify error message is displayed indicating invalid credentials
Ensure user remains on login page

title: Google OAuth Login Flow
description: Validate successful authentication via Google OAuth including role-based redirection and session handling.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Click 'Sign in with Google' button
Complete Google OAuth authorization
Verify user is authenticated and redirected correctly
Check session is established and user info is consistent

title: Persona CRUD Operations
description: Verify create, read, update, and delete operations for personas function correctly with valid/invalid inputs.

steps.description: Navigate to Personas management page
Create a new persona with valid attributes
Verify new persona appears in the persona list
Edit the created persona and update fields
Verify changes saved and displayed accurately
Delete the created persona
Confirm persona is removed from the list
Attempt to create persona with missing required fields
Verify proper validation error messages are shown

title: Brand Voice Management CRUD and Versioning
description: Test creation, editing including tone and personality, versioning, and deletion of brand voices with analytics verification.

steps.description: Navigate to Brand Voice management page
Create a new brand voice with valid attributes including tone, personality, and guidelines
Verify new brand voice appears in the list
Update brand voice details and save as a new version
Verify version history is maintained correctly
Perform interactive voice test and record results
Verify that analytics for voice testing are recorded
Delete the created brand voice
Confirm brand voice is removed completely

title: AI Copy Generation Normal Flow
description: Validate generating marketing copy using AI with valid persona, brand voice, and platform template selection, and verify copy preview and export functions.

steps.description: Open AI Copy Generator interface
Select existing persona, brand voice, and template
Enter brief for copy generation
Initiate AI copy generation request
Verify that AI generates copy correctly and displays multi-platform preview
Export generated copy to chosen formats
Confirm export files are correctly formatted and downloadable

title: AI Copy Generation with AI API Failure Fallback
description: Test system behavior when AI backend fails or times out and fallback mock data is used without blocking user flow.

steps.description: Trigger AI copy generation with simulated backend failure
Verify fallback mock data is returned and displayed
Ensure user can continue editing or exporting generated copy

title: Campaign Management CRUD and Status Transitions
description: Verify creation, editing, status updates (draft, active, paused, completed), budget handling, and deletion of campaigns.

steps.description: Navigate to Campaign Management page
Create a new campaign with valid inputs including budget and status 'DRAFT'
Verify campaign appears in list with correct details
Change campaign status through all valid transitions and save
Verify status changes are reflected and allowed only in valid order
Edit campaign budget and other details
Verify updated values are saved and visible
Delete the campaign
Confirm campaign is removed from the list

title: Editorial Calendar Scheduling and Drag-and-Drop
description: Verify that campaigns and posts can be scheduled, edited, and rescheduled using drag-and-drop with proper notifications.

steps.description: Open Editorial Calendar page
Schedule campaign and social posts to specific dates
Verify events appear correctly in month, week, and day views
Perform drag-and-drop to reschedule events
Confirm date changes persist and are reflected across views
Verify automated notifications/reminders trigger on scheduled dates

title: Analytics Dashboard Data Accuracy and Export
description: Validate that campaign and platform analytics are accurate, update dynamically, allow drill-downs, and support PDF/CSV exports.

steps.description: Open Analytics Dashboard
Verify metrics such as CTR, conversions, ROI, engagement are displayed correctly
Change period filters (7d, 30d, 90d)
Ensure dashboard updates dynamically with selected filters
Use drill-down features to view detailed campaign stats
Verify detailed metrics correspond to aggregated overview
Export reports as PDF and CSV
Check exported files for correctness and proper formatting

title: Template Library Filtering and Custom Variable Usage
description: Check template filtering by category and type, template preview functionality, management of favorites, and usage tracking accuracy.

steps.description: Navigate to Template Library
Apply filters by category and content type
Verify displayed templates match filter criteria
Open template preview and verify interactive content
Use custom variables to modify template text
Confirm variables are substituted correctly in preview
Mark templates as favorites and remove from favorites
Validate favorites are persisted and displayed correctly

title: OAuth Integration with Social Media Platforms
description: Validate OAuth flow, configuration testing, secure connection maintenance, webhook logging, and error handling for social platform integrations.

steps.description: Initiate OAuth connection to a social media platform
Complete OAuth authorization flow correctly
Verify tokens are securely stored and valid
Test configuration settings and connectivity
Confirm test results indicate success
Trigger webhook events from social platform
Verify webhook events are logged accurately in system
Simulate OAuth failure and expired tokens
Ensure appropriate error messages and reconnection prompts are displayed

title: Admin Panel Access Control and Audit Logging
description: Verify that Admin and Super Admin roles can access authorized features, manage users, roles and permissions, and that all actions are logged for audit.

steps.description: Log in as Super Admin user
Verify access to all admin panel modules
Update user permissions and roles
Confirm permission changes take effect immediately
Log in as Admin user
Validate access restrictions to certain modules (e.g., billing, permissions update)
Perform various administrative actions
Verify all actions are recorded in audit logs with timestamp and user info

title: Performance Benchmark Under 2 Seconds Loading
description: Test page load times under typical load conditions to ensure performance targets are met across devices.

steps.description: Open major frontend pages on desktop, tablet, and mobile devices
Measure and confirm page loads within 2 seconds
Verify Lighthouse performance scores are above 90

title: Accessibility Compliance Testing
description: Validate WCAG 2.1 AA compliance by verifying keyboard navigation, screen reader compatibility, ARIA labels, and color contrast.

steps.description: Navigate through key UI components using only keyboard
Ensure focus order and visible indicators are logical and consistent
Use screen reader to navigate and read content aloud
Verify all interactive elements have descriptive ARIA labels and are announced correctly
Check color contrast ratios for text and UI elements
Confirm all meet or exceed WCAG 2.1 AA contrast requirements

title: Progressive Web App Offline Mode Functionality
description: Verify PWA capabilities including offline mode operation, caching of key pages/data, and mobile installation prompts.

steps.description: Access platform on supported mobile device
Simulate offline network conditions
Verify that key UI components load and function in offline mode
Test adding app to home screen and launching from installed PWA
Confirm app launches correctly with responsive UI

title: Email Campaign Creation and Sending
description: Validate creation of email campaigns, scheduling, sending, and tracking analytics behavior.

steps.description: Navigate to Email Marketing page
Create new email campaign with valid template and audience
Verify campaign appears in list with correct details
Schedule and send the email campaign
Verify sending status and receipt confirmations
Review campaign analytics for delivery, open and click rates
Confirm analytics data is accurate and timely
